CertificateBody.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 16384  

Pattern: [\u0009\u000A\u000D\u0020-\u00FF]+  

Update requires: No interruption

CertificateChain.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 2097152  

Pattern: [\u0009\u000A\u000D\u0020-\u00FF]+  

Update requires: No interruption

ServerCertificateName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 128  

Pattern: [\w+=,.@-]+  

Update requires: No interruption

Path.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 512  

Pattern: (\u002F)|(\u002F[\u0021-\u007F]+\u002F)  

Update requires: No interruption

PrivateKey.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 16384  

Pattern: [\u0009\u000A\u000D\u0020-\u00FF]+  

Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the server certificate
Arn.markdownDescription:
Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the server certificate

---

Required: No

Type: string  
Minimum Length: 1  

Maximum Length: 1600   

Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No

Type: array     

Update requires: No interruption

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Value.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

Key.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.
